title: Thoongaa Kandal Lyrics Maya
stanzas:
thoonga kangal yengum unnaal
neengum unnaal thengum kanneer
thuliyil needhaan neeraai neeyo

oonaa uyira rendum ondru
ondril ondrai urugum nenjam
nenjil needhaan theeraai neeyo

mugathinai moodaamal
agathinai thaa
virumbinen vaazha
thirumbi neeyum vaa
kaadhal maari oodal aagi
kaanal aanaai niyayama

pon vidiyalai unnil kanden
podhum endrum
thoora vaanthai kannil konden
kaalam urugum munn
vaanam viriyum tharunam
siragugalai virikkum

baarathil naalum neelum
kanavugalil karainthu
pogaiyil aagayam
moodinaal thaanduveno
aagayam thaan ellaiyo
nee vaa

thoonga kangal yengum unnaal
neengum unnaal thengum kanneer
thuliyil needhaan neeraai neeyo

oonaa uyira rendum ondru
ondril ondrai urugum nenjam
nenjil needhaan theeraai neeyo

agathinai moodaamal
mugathinai thaaraai
thirumbinen vaazha
virumbi neeyum vaa

kaayam maara naanum neeyum
koodal aanaal sogam theerum
oodal aagi kaadhal maari
thoonga kangal thoonguma

seo.title: Thoongaa Kandal Lyrics Maya
seo.description: Get the complete Thoongaa Kandal Lyrics Maya from Maya. Read the lyrics penned by Kutti Revathi and composed by Ron Ethan Yohann and sung by Shakthisree Gopalan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Kutti Revathi, Maya, Ron Ethan Yohann, Shakthisree Gopalan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
